text: Georges Stuber (11 May 1925 â€“ 16 April 2006) was a former Swiss football player. He played as a goalkeeper. He played for Switzerland in the 1950 and 1954 FIFA World Cup.Copa do Mundo da FIFA Brasil 1950 and also played for FC Luzern, FC Lausanne-Sport, and Servette FC. Stuber was born in Zug, Switzerland. Stuber died on 16 April 2006 at the age of 80. == References == == Other websites == *FIFA profile * Category:1925 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Swiss footballers Category:1950 FIFA World Cup players Category:1954 FIFA World Cup players Category:People from Zug
title: Georges Stuber
